languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс склоняется над трупом.{/n} "{name}, обрати внимание, все эти увечья — фасад. Они нанесены посмертно, заметно позже. Смерть наступила мгновенно от колющего удара в сердце. Его убил профессионал, кто-то, кто точно знал, что делает".

{n}Heinrix bends over the corpse.{/n} "{name}, take heed, all these mutilations are a facade. They were inflicted postmortem, clearly a while after. He died instantly from a stab to the heart. He was killed by a professional, someone who knew exactly what they were doing."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс склоняется над трупом.{/n} "{name}, обрати внимание, все эти увечья — фасад. Они нанесены посмертно, заметно позже. Смерть наступила мгновенно от колющего удара в сердце. Его убил профессионал, кто-то, кто точно знал, что делает".

{n}Heinrix bends over the corpse.{/n} "{name}, take heed, all these mutilations are a facade. They were inflicted postmortem, clearly a while after. He died instantly from a stab to the heart. He was killed by a professional, someone who knew exactly what they were doing."

{n}Heinrix bends over the corpse.{/n} "{name}, take heed, all these mutilations are a facade. They were inflicted postmortem, clearly a while after. He died instantly from a stab to the heart. He was killed by a professional, someone who knew exactly what they were doing."

{n}Heinrix bends over the corpse.{/n} "{name}, take heed, all these mutilations are a facade. They were inflicted postmortem, clearly a while after. He died instantly from a stab to the heart. He was killed by a professional, someone who knew exactly what they were doing."

{n}Heinrix bends over the corpse.{/n} "{name}, take heed, all these mutilations are a facade. They were inflicted postmortem, clearly a while after. He died instantly from a stab to the heart. He was killed by a professional, someone who knew exactly what they were doing."

{n}Heinrix bends over the corpse.{/n} "{name}, take heed, all these mutilations are a facade. They were inflicted postmortem, clearly a while after. He died instantly from a stab to the heart. He was killed by a professional, someone who knew exactly what they were doing."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix examina el cuerpo.{/n} «{name}, tenga cuidado, estas mutilaciones no son más que una tapadera. Son póstumas, la muerte la ocasionó una puñalada en el corazón. Su asesino es un profesional, sabía perfectamente lo que estaba haciendo».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over the corpse.{/n} "{name}, take heed, all these mutilations are a facade. They were inflicted postmortem, clearly a while after. He died instantly from a stab to the heart. He was killed by a professional, someone who knew exactly what they were doing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix examina el cuerpo.{/n} «{name}, tenga cuidado, estas mutilaciones no son más que una tapadera. Son póstumas, la muerte la ocasionó una puñalada en el corazón. Su asesino es un profesional, sabía perfectamente lo que estaba haciendo».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは死体の上にかがみ込んだ。{/n}「よく見てください、{name}。これらの傷はすべてニセモノです。死後、しばらくしてからつけられたものですね。心臓を刺されて即死したということは、プロの仕事でしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over the corpse.{/n} "{name}, take heed, all these mutilations are a facade. They were inflicted postmortem, clearly a while after. He died instantly from a stab to the heart. He was killed by a professional, someone who knew exactly what they were doing."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは死体の上にかがみ込んだ。{/n}「よく見てください、{name}。これらの傷はすべてニセモノです。死後、しばらくしてからつけられたものですね。心臓を刺されて即死したということは、プロの仕事でしょう」

languages.text: {n}海因里希俯下身，看着尸体。{/n}“注意，{name}，尸体上这些明显的伤口都是障眼法，是死后造成的。很显然，受害者死亡一段时间之后，尸体遭到了破坏。真正的凶手一刀刺入他的心脏，他当场死亡。杀害他的人是专业杀手，技艺非常熟练。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over the corpse.{/n} "{name}, take heed, all these mutilations are a facade. They were inflicted postmortem, clearly a while after. He died instantly from a stab to the heart. He was killed by a professional, someone who knew exactly what they were doing."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希俯下身，看着尸体。{/n}“注意，{name}，尸体上这些明显的伤口都是障眼法，是死后造成的。很显然，受害者死亡一段时间之后，尸体遭到了破坏。真正的凶手一刀刺入他的心脏，他当场死亡。杀害他的人是专业杀手，技艺非常熟练。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix beugt sich über den Leichnam.{/n} "{name}, seht Euch das an. Diese Verstümmelungen sind allesamt nur Fassade. Sie wurden eindeutig erst nach dem Tod vorgenommen. Er war nach einem Stich ins Herz sofort tot. Das war das Werk eines Profis. Da wusste jemand genau, was er tut."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over the corpse.{/n} "{name}, take heed, all these mutilations are a facade. They were inflicted postmortem, clearly a while after. He died instantly from a stab to the heart. He was killed by a professional, someone who knew exactly what they were doing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix beugt sich über den Leichnam.{/n} "{name}, seht Euch das an. Diese Verstümmelungen sind allesamt nur Fassade. Sie wurden eindeutig erst nach dem Tod vorgenommen. Er war nach einem Stich ins Herz sofort tot. Das war das Werk eines Profis. Da wusste jemand genau, was er tut."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se penche sur le corps.{/n} « {name}, ces mutilations ne sont là que pour détourner notre attention. Elles ont clairement été infligées post mortem. La cause du décès est un coup de couteau dans le cœur. Il est mort sur le coup. Il a été tué par un professionnel, quelqu'un qui savait très bien ce qu'il faisait. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over the corpse.{/n} "{name}, take heed, all these mutilations are a facade. They were inflicted postmortem, clearly a while after. He died instantly from a stab to the heart. He was killed by a professional, someone who knew exactly what they were doing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se penche sur le corps.{/n} « {name}, ces mutilations ne sont là que pour détourner notre attention. Elles ont clairement été infligées post mortem. La cause du décès est un coup de couteau dans le cœur. Il est mort sur le coup. Il a été tué par un professionnel, quelqu'un qui savait très bien ce qu'il faisait. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, cesedin üzerine eğiliyor.{/n} "{name}, temkinli yaklaş. Tüm bu yaralar aslında birer yanılsama. Ölümün bir hayli ardından yapıldıkları aşikâr. Kalbinden bıçaklanarak anında ölmüş. Bu adam, ne yaptığını çok iyi bilen bir profesyonel tarafından öldürülmüş."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bends over the corpse.{/n} "{name}, take heed, all these mutilations are a facade. They were inflicted postmortem, clearly a while after. He died instantly from a stab to the heart. He was killed by a professional, someone who knew exactly what they were doing."
